metadata.title: CVE-2020-19726 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in binutils libbfd.c 2.36 relating to the auxiliarysymbol data allows attackers to read or write to system memory or cause adenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-19726` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.9+esm1').
